high_descs: Turn to your right and walk to the end of the coffee table then turn right again and continue walking to the couch.
Pick up the red cushion on the left side of the couch.
Turn to your right and walk to the lamp in the corner of the room, the raise the pillow in the air, close to the lamp shade.
Turn on the lamp in the corner.
anns.task_desc: Use a pillow to turn the lamp in the corner on.

high_descs: Move to the left side of the large green sofa
Pick up the red cushion that is sitting on top of the green sofa
Carry the red cushion over to the floor lamp in the corner of the room
anns.task_desc: Carry a cushion while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and go to the green couch.
Pick up the red pillow from the couch.
Turn right and go to the light in the corner.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the pillow off of the couch and turn on the lamp.
